summary: todoroki, shinso, kaminari and midoryia (separately) couple scenarios with their s/o ??? ;3c  (I cant English soz 😔)
question: todoroki, shinso, kaminari and midoryia (separately) couple scenarios with their s/o ??? ;3c  (I cant English soz 😔)
answer:
BET SAY LESS

Todoroki

❤️Y’all (soz guys im from Texas) are the type of couple that people didn’t even know were a couple. Yeah you were one of the few people he talked to on a regular basis, but it still shocked everyone when he leaned over to kiss your cheek. Since when were you dating??

💙There are times where he doesn’t speak, and uses certain actions and gestures instead. When he’s proud of you, he’d give you a soft kiss on the forehead. When he wants to hold you and cuddle, he’d squeeze your waist two times, indicating that he wants you to sit in his lap. When he wants to rant about something, he’d lay his head on your lap before getting ready to talk, talk, and talk. Those times are probably the most he does.

❤️Makes you eat soba with him Eats soba with you like it’s required for your everyday lives. Like it’s some type of mandatory task. You’d be willing to get something else to eat and he’d just say “We haven’t had soba since last week.” With the most convincing pout he could put on his face. One time when you didn’t get soba, he was actually pretty sad. He said it was okay, but it seemed like every bite of pizza he took brought him closer to just sobbing. His face didn’t show it, but his eyes did.

💙When he texts you, every message has proper grammar. No abbreviations, no slang, nothing. From the start, this boy has never seen a meme or vine in his life. You would throw a vine reference at him, maybe, “What up, I’m Jared, I’m 19, and I never freaking learned how to read,” and he’d be genuinely confused. “You’re not Jared. You’re my girlfriend.” Now he understands memes and vines, and would even try to reference them himself. It’s adorable when he tries. One time when you sent him a meme, he wanted you to send pictures of yourself instead. He likes memes, but he loves you.

Shinso

💜Y’all are the type of couple that most people would deem the perfect couple. It’s a mystery why people think that, but when the two of you are seen doing something together, someone would most likely say “couple goals!!”

💜You want to mess around, get loud, and reference memes? No problem. Shinsou could do that with you all day. However, do expect sleepy cuddles at the end of it all. It’s fun but tiring.

💜Likes taking pictures of you. Whether you’re just waking up, with your hair all over your head, or you’re dressed up for an occasion, this boy takes a lot of pictures in many different angles. One time he even took a photo of you from the top of the cabinet before jumping down and practically scaring the life out of you. What the heck was he doing all the way up there??

💜Loves when you play in his hair. Just patting it, combing your fingers through it, even lightly scratching his scalp. Before the two of you started dating, his hair would normally get a bit greasy before he decided to wash it. Now he washes it on a set schedule so it would never be greasy. “You’re hands are precious and I want my hair to be in good condition for them.” He explained to you one time. He’s also a nuzzler. Call it what you want, but whenever you guys cuddle, he’d nuzzle his nose into your neck, and would let out this content sigh, similar to a cat’s purr.

Kaminari

💛Y’all are the type of couple who EVERYONE knows is a couple. Whether it’s because you both show each other off, or because Kaminari shows you off. I’m talking tons of pictures of you on social media. Screenshots of text messages between the two of you. Heck, he even mentions your name at least once in every conversation he has with his friends. It’s not necessarily showing off, it’s more of him expressing his happiness. And you just happen to be the source.

💛PDA is something you’d be all too familiar with, but it’s kept to a minimum. Because of this, Kaminari is twice as affectionate in private. PDA consists of things like cheek kisses and hand holding. But behind closed doors, he’s like a baby koala clinging onto its mother.

💛He isn’t worried about your relationship. But one thing he does worry about sometimes is if you ever think he’s too dumb for you. Not only does he have some of the lowest grades in class 1-A, but he’s also a complete fool when he short circuits his brain. The first time you had to take care of him in his foolish state, he was deeply embarrassed afterwards when you started talking about the things he did. What made him embarrassed the most is what you told him about him touching all over you. He may be mildly perverted, but he truly loved you and respected you to an extent. It’s true he clings to you like a koala, but he wouldn’t let his hands roam freely without your consent. For the remainder of that day, he apologized a lot and was afraid to touch you in any way.

💛On a lighter note: Memes and vines to the max. This dude has them all.

Midoriya

💚Y’all are the type of couple no one entirely expected to be a couple. How did Midoriya get a girlfriend as easy as it is for him to get flustered? Not to mention super clumsy. Yes, you were shy as well, but Midoriya’s shyness is a distinct shyness. However, everyone thought you guys were adorable together nonetheless.

💚Things seemed a little too serious at the beginning of the relationship. Of course a relationship is supposed to be serious, but not serious to the point every moment in the relationship has to be about Midoriya proving to you how much of a man he is. This poor boy wasn’t feeling too confident about what you thought of him as your boyfriend. He was worried you thought he was a wimp, or any other of the countless, negative words that came to his mind. Not to worry though, as this battle was fought and won when the two of you sat down and talked about it. After that talk, it was evident that his confidence went up. Relationship wise.

💚He’s always talking about you to his mom. She probably loves you just as much as he does! It’s so refreshing to his mom that Izu chose the perfect girl to have in his life. If you didn’t already have parents, she would’ve considered adopting you—which is a little strange but uH we love Inko very much.

💚He’d probably never say this, but he loves laying on your chest because it’s squishy because he can hear your heartbeat, which soothes him. But he doesn’t really have to say it. It’s obvious he likes laying on your chest, otherwise, he wouldn’t do it almost every time you cuddle.

———

blog.name: transiform
blog.title: do not stand at my grave and cry;
blog.description: i am not there. i did not die.

tags: big super big ultra big thanks to DJ @quirkify
i wanted this to be good
AND DOUBLE big thanks to everyone in 3rd year for listening and talking to me about this
summary: notes: if you want to respond, feel free! i like discussing with people. also, if you feel as though you’re being singled out by...
body:
notes: if you want to respond, feel free! i like discussing with people. also, if you feel as though you’re being singled out by my wording, you might want to review your values, how you view abuse victims and childcare, and all of that. i didn’t write this down with any specific people in mind, so believe me when i say it’s not about you. doubly also, i am also an abuse survivor, and have consulted with other abuse survivors to make sure i am still not stepping out of line. just thought this was worth mentioning B)

so i’ve noticed something pretty uncomfortable within multiple different social circles i’m in—particularly in fandoms—and i’ve just been thinking; you people have a really weird way of seeing child care as an end-all be-all milestone when it comes to survivors of abuse. the biggest and most recent examples i’ve come across have been with none other than Shigaraki Tomura, which is kind of shocking whenever i think of it.

either way, i jotted down a few thoughts on it here, so get ready for a joyride!

let’s talk about this in a general sense first: people tend to go to extremes when trying to prove that abuse victims can overcome their trauma and be “good,” by which i mean “normal.” normality within society is often found in how neurotypical and abled a person can present themselves to be; that’s why there’s this toxic idea that depression is a “normal,” or “safe” mental illness, as opposed to psychosis, BPD, or anything else along those lines. i am abled myself, so i don’t have any personal experience with this same sentiment being echoed to physically disabled people (i do think that it happens, i just can’t call any specific examples to mind). i can tell you, though, that i have heard lots of personal accounts—from disabled friends—of abled gym teachers telling them to just “do it,” or “push past [their disability],” which i think is worth noting because they are trying to make you act as visibly abled as possible, i.e. “normal.”

another example of society-based normality (at least, in America), is being able to take care of and raise a child.

moving onto shigaraki…

he was kidnapped and groomed into villainy by AfO at around ages 4-8. when AfO took him in, he was very vulnerable, after having either seen his father die or killing his father himself, and then seemingly being abandoned by both heroes and regular citizens in what appears to be a dirty alleyway. why are people so adamant about him taking care of a child—specifically without him getting any sort of treatment prior? and by treatment, i mean professional care. shigaraki needs therapy, might need medication, and definitely needs to partake in some sort of rehabilitative program (like inpatient) before he’s reintroduced to society. he needs to work through his skewed perception of both society and also other people that AfO’s abuse instilled in him. while shigaraki has definitely grown past seeing his current LOV members as pawns, he’s still quick to refer to gigantomachia as “the power” and a “thing” in more recent chapters, suggesting that most of the growth his worldview has experienced is changing from me vs. society to us vs. society.

speaking of growth, shigaraki hasn’t been shown to be aware of the abuse he’s undergone. he still trusts AfO, still trusts and wants to work with the doctor—and might i add that shigaraki likely knows that this doctor utilized children when creating nomu?  and even if he doesn’t know, he hasn’t been shown to have any sort of remorse over using and wanting to duplicate the quirk erasing bullets that were made as a byproduct of the horrific abuse eri underwent! moreover, shigaraki had heard the plan that overhaul had, and he knew about eri—the league of villains talk about “the child at the center,” and might have even planned to take Eri in themselves because they wanted Overhaul’s final product—and this didn’t seem to make him any less willing to work with the Eight Precepts. ALSO, he was perfectly fine with both killing, and later kidnapping literal teenagers. his kill list seems to consist of midoriya and todoroki so far, and he kidnapped bakugou—and here’s a reminder that he treated bakugou more like a business partner rather than a teenager. he even goes so far as to call him a new recruit! and when bakugou showed that he wasn’t going to come willingly? he asked AfO for his power—he was going to strip bakugou of his free will and make him join the LOV whether he wanted to or not.

what i’m trying to say is that he probably sees how he was raised (read: groomed) as normal, and if he ever happened to take in a child that was in the same vulnerable position as he was, he might continue the cycle of abuse. he needs to care for himself properly before he thinks about caring for another still-developing human being! he needs to recover, people! to learn, and heal, and grow.

yes, shigaraki is an abuse survivor—and i think he’s a good portrayal of one, at that. at the same time, this fact doesn’t mean he is a good representation of an abuse survivor that is healing. i know that traumatized people will project their trauma into fiction—i am a traumatized person, and i cope like this too! when people project their trauma into fiction, they need to be conscious and mindful of how and where they do it. whether or not they cope publicly is one thing, and if they do choose to cope publicly, they need to know who their audience will be.

moving on! why is raising a child is the perfect sign of someone being healthy enough to pass as normal? is there something wrong with people that don’t want children? American society seems to think so, at least—whenever i tell my mother that i don’t want a child (specifically because of my traumas and mental illnesses, and my worries that i will end up being a bad parent and traumatizing my future child), she tells me that i am making her very sad, or that i still have time to grow and change that idea, or anything else that insinuates that she doesn’t accept this fact. suggesting that shigaraki should, or even could take care of a child and put them in a healthy, safe environment in the current situation that he’s in makes me think that you need to reevaluate your personal values and views on abuse victims.

not being made to deal with children is not an inherent flaw, and it’s not something anyone needs to change. some people just aren’t built to take care of children, like me and shigaraki! it doesn’t mean that they dislike children, or don’t care for them—in fact, i personally care about children a lot! it’s just a matter of putting the child first, and wanting them to be in a safer, healthier environment, with a competent caretaker. the fact of the matter is that shigaraki, right now? is not a competent caretaker, and wouldn’t be able to provide the child with the stability and enrichment they need while developing.

all in all, don’t force children on abuse survivors. taking care of a child isn’t proof that someone is “better,” or “healthy,” or any of that. thank you for reading down this far akjfdhsf

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
summary: can I get an angsty scenario for bakugo(or whoever u want)xfem!reader where they’re best friends who have been in love with each...
question: can I get an angsty scenario for bakugo(or whoever u want)xfem!reader where they’re best friends who have been in love with each other, but they didn’t want to ruin their friendship and now bakugo is getting married, she’s helping him get ready like tying his tie and when they lock eyes u can tell there is sadness behind them but the wedding is about to happen and while he is at the altar he wants reader to do smth, I’d prefer an angsty end but it’s up to you!
answer:
It’s okay I guess. Not as much angst as other stuff I’ve done but I also just remembered I started it 😂 so here’s Now or Never

Why was I so stubborn…


It had been years since you and Bakugo were this close. The sun was shining. The breeze was perfect. Even the soft buzz of nothing felt warm and comforting. Today was the day that the two of you had waited for since you were two wanna be heroes on the playground. It was nice to get some alone quiet time before the chaotic good of the day. But, per usual, something chaotic had already begun.

“Katsuki, please stop moving. You’re messing me up.”


“I’m sorry.”


“It’s not fine but I get it. You’re nervous. It’s perfectly fine.”


The only was that it wasn’t. The comfort of the room wasn’t what he wanted. It wasn’t even what you wanted. It’s something that shouldn’t happen because today wasn’t your day. Today was his big day. His wedding. The moment you wished you could share with him in the next few. The walk. The tears. The vows of forever and more. This was supposed to be yours. And by the look in his glass covered eyes, he knew too.

“No, I mean I’m sorry. For everything.”


“Katsuki w-“


He cut you off with his sharp tongue.


“Don’t call me that. Don’t call me that right now.”


“That’s your fucking name. What else am I supposed to call you,” you were gripping his untied splash of burgundy and crisp white shirt. “It’s all I’ve ever called you…”


“(Y/N)?”


“What.” Your response came out harder than it should have but you didn’t care.


“What’s gonna happen? To us?” He sounded pathetic in your ear. The strongest, boldest hero you knew was crumbling and you hated that it was because of you. So you decided to play dumb.

“What do you mean?”


“Don’t play fucking dumb.” He knows me too well.


“I’m serious. You’re about to be happy for the rest of your life. And it’s gonna be great.”


“But it’s not gonna be with you. What’s the point of this ring if it’s not to match yours.”


There it was. The confession you wanted. Desired. Craved all these years. Right here. In an empty dressing room. On the day of his wedding.


“Ka- Bakugo I don’t know.”


“Then run away with me. Let’s leave this all behind and travel. Like we always talked about.”


This part you weren’t expecting. He was faithful. He was a gentleman. But he was reckless.


“No, I can’t. You can’t. The two of you have spent so much money on this day. And you’re in love with her. You’re just nervous. It’s just nerves,” your rambling didn’t stop there.


“Yeah I’ve loved you for all these years and wanted this to be my day but it’s fine. You’re happy. You’re in love. She’s amazing. She loves you so much and -“


You were swept away by warm. By a touch on the small of your back. A hand on the back of your neck, slowly traveling to your tear stained cheek. A pull to bring you in as close as possible. A kiss that was heaven sent.

He pulled away ever so slowly, painfully even, and looked you dead in your (e/c) orbs. The fire that you fell in love with so long ago came back to his crimson eyes. Dangerously lovely, but shedding the softest tears.

“Run away with me. Leave this all behind with me. Let’s have forever.”


Your mind was racing a mile a minute. Cheeks flushed and heart about to go under when the softest knock sounded at the door.

A male voice spoke.


“It’s now or never.”


You and Katsuki looked at each other, minds made up. It really was now or never.

title: Short and Sweet
body:
Sero x Reader (fem!reader) 

1.8K 

Summary: Your neighbors are acting rather obnoxiously, so you decide to have a word with them. (short fem!reader with a super strength Quirk) 

Warnings: NSFW, vaginal fingering, light bondage, some cursing, and definitely some sweet talking 

Notes: Requests are closed at the moment, but be sure to check out my masterlist!

Enough was enough. You had tried to be patient with them, but there was only so much that you could take, especially when your walls were currently rattling so hard that all of your hanging picture frames and decorations had fallen off of them. You didn’t know why your neighbors were blaring their music so loudly, but it was about time for them to stop. You and Sero had a charity event to attend after he got home from patrolling, and you really didn’t need that kind of background music distracting you while you were getting ready.

As the saying goes, you catch more flies with honey than vinegar, so in what was supposed to be a gesture of goodwill towards your neighbors, you filled up a cookie tin with some treats that you had made earlier. After that, you then made your way over to the apartment that was adjacent to yours, whose door was still somehow miraculously hanging on even though it looked like it was literally vibrating because of the loud music playing behind it. With a deep, calming breath to help you center yourself, you plastered the sweetest grin that you could across your face and then rapped your knuckles against the door.

Based on the way that the music didn’t stop, you assumed that they hadn’t heard you, so you knocked again, slightly harder this time. Still no reply or pause in the music. You had to knock five more times before the music finally lowered (although it wasn’t by much), and, seeing as you kept increasing your strength with each consecutive knock, there were now some nice knuckle-shaped dents on the front of the door. Your levels of irritation had increased dramatically in the minutes that it took you to get your neighbors’ attention, but you still kept the smile on your face, knowing that Sero would have wanted you to keep this civil.

Of course, when your scowling neighbors finally showed up at the door, yanking it open with a fury that you knew was unjustified, you realized that civility might not be have been on option in the first place.  

“What the hell do you want?”

You hadn’t seen your neighbors much beforehand; they were relatively new to the apartment complex, and you could see now that they were a relatively young couple, probably about the same age as you and Sero. Maybe in another life you could have been friends with them, but as it was currently, they were going to be lucky if they didn’t end up getting the same treatment as their door.

“Hi! I don’t think we’ve met yet, but I’m your next-door neighbor! It’s nice to finally meet you, and I brought you some treats as a welcoming gift!”

It physically pained you to keep your voice so steady while you greeted them, but you were hoping that the sight of a small, gentle-spoken woman would make them lighten up a bit. It didn’t.

“Right, whatever. Are you just here to fuck around or do you actually have something important to say?”

Maybe if rage hadn’t been boiling through your veins, you would have noticed your grip on the cookie tin tightening, but that was obviously not the case as your smile took on a much more manic quality.

“Well, actually, your music is a little loud, and I was wondering if you could turn it down a bit.”

Obviously, your neighbors didn’t hear the sound of bending metal, either.

“Fat chance of that, Shortstack. Leave us the hell alone.”

They slammed the door right in your face, which was definitely not a good idea considering that it was the final straw that made you drop all sense of propriety. The next thing that your neighbors knew, their door had been ripped right off of its hinges and there was crushed cookie tin whirling its way into their apartment. They both paled as they looked back to where the door should have been, your tiny form looking much more terrifying than it had earlier, the chilling look on your face enough to let them know that they should have acted just a bit more politely.

“I’m gonna need you to turn that shit off.”

When they didn’t move (which, in hindsight, was probably because they were terrified), you decided to help them out by ridding them of whatever music system that they had. However, as you stepped foot into their apartment, a familiar set of arms wrapped themselves around your waist, and you felt yourself being lifted up before you were carried away from the scene.

“Sorry about that! I’ll take care of the door later!”

“Damn it, Hanta! Let me at those rude fuckers!”

He did not let you at those rude fuckers, unfortunately, and before you could try to convince him to let you go, he had you back inside your own apartment. He stood between you and the door in an effort to make sure that you didn’t go back to the other apartment.

“Y/N…”

The way that he breathed your name, coupled with the soft grin that he gave you, made you turn your head away in embarrassment as a light blush crossed your cheeks. It was an unfair power that he had over you, that gorgeous smile of his able to quell your anger within seconds. It made you embarrassed over how quickly you had lost your temper, and while you would admit that ripping a door off its hinges may have been a bit of an overreaction, those jerks really did deserve to have some fear put in them.

He didn’t seem to blame you, though, and that smile of his never left as he leaned down to press his face against your neck. His hands also went to rest on your hips, and the apartment was quiet as Sero took a moment to breathe in your scent before placing a light kiss at the juncture of your neck and shoulder.

“I won’t lie, I kind of figured this would happen. I ran into them a few weeks ago, and I just knew it was only a matter of time before their attitudes got them in trouble with you. I didn’t expect you to tear their door down, though.”

“Hmph.”

“Aw, are you still mad, Y/N?”

“A little.”

“Mm, that’s alright.”

Sero followed his statement with a few more hot kisses to your neck, lingering with them for a moment to make sure that they gave you chills. His hands also started to wonder, moving to caress your thighs as they were exposed by the dress that you were wearing.

“We can’t have you mad while you’re at the charity, now can we? I guess I’ll have to take care of you.”

He briefly pulled away from you to check the time on his phone, making a disappointed ‘tsk’ when he saw how late it was.

“Hm, we don’t have a lot of time, though…Well, I can work with it.”

Before you could question what he was talking about, Sero dipped back down, this time pressing his lips against your own. It was such a gentle kiss, but it was still enough to keep you distracted as Sero took both of your arms, holding them above your head and spinning you around until you were pressed against the wall. His hold on you momentarily disappeared, but then you heard the ripping of tape, and as Sero finally ended the tender kiss, he taped your hands against the wall.

“Keep these here for me, alright?”

You couldn’t even properly reply to him before his lips were working against yours again, still gentle in their movements, matching perfectly to the light trailing of his fingers against your inner thigh. That tender touch climbed higher and higher, until Sero’s hand finally reached your clothed mound and he stroked you along the outside of your underwear.

“You shouldn’t let people like that get to you, you know?”

As Sero slid his hand into your panties, he moved his head back to your shoulder, leaning it there and turning his face towards your neck so that you could practically feel his words against your skin. He teased you for a moment, barely tracing his fingers against your outer labia as you tensed up with anticipation.

“They don’t deserve your time or effort.”

He finally pressed further into you, humming at the warm slickness that his fingers met before he continued to caress your womanhood.

“Hanta, please just-”

“Shhh. I told you that I’d take care of you, right? Just be a little patient.”

His touch against you was soothing in nature, but it did little to actually calm you. You needed more from him, and you tried to buck your hips against his hand to get the friction that you craved, but you could only move so far since you were pinned against the wall. You could feel his smile get bigger against your neck, and he finally brought his fingers up to your clit, lightly circling them over the engorged bud and causing you to gasp.

“See? All you had to do was trust me.”

You almost groaned when he took his fingers away from you, but before you could get the noise out, he was sliding two of his long digits into your waiting entrance, his thumb moving to press against your clit. You did end up groaning after that, but it was sound of relief instead of frustration.

“You’re so amazing, Y/N. You have so much strength hidden in that beautiful body of yours, and it never fails to amaze me.”

You couldn’t reply to him, not through the moan that you let out when he started to pump his fingers in and out of you, ever so slightly curling them forward so they could pass over that sweet spot inside of you. He was also putting his thumb to work, slowly working it around your clit as your legs started to tremble from all of the stimulation.

“I feel so lucky to have you, to see you smile every day, to kiss you, to touch you, to make you feel this good.”

His words only fueled the fire that was growing in your belly, and your body grew taut as your climax crept closer and closer to fruition. You couldn’t help but chant his name like a prayer as he continued to work you, the last verse being shouted as your orgasm burned through your body. Your hips stuttered against your lover’s hand, and he pulled it away from you as you started to whimper from his overbearing touch, settling to just stroke your outer folds again as you finally started to relax. Once your breathing evened out, he pulled his hand away from you completely, and moved to where he was leaning his forehead against yours.

“Better?”

“Mhm.”

“That’s good. We still have a few minutes to clean up before we have to head out, if you still want to go.”

“Kind of hard to skip out on a charity. I just need a minute. And Hanta?”

“Hm?”

“Thanks.”

“Any time, babe.”
